musicalLanguage.description: The Ragtime Dance (1902) was originally conceived as a folk ballet with sung directions. This piano arrangement captures its dance-like character with stomping bass patterns and a melody that invites movement.
teachingGoals: Feel the dance pulse underlying ragtime
styleTips: Imagine dancers stepping to each beat
Give slight accent to beats 1 and 3 in the bass for a stomping feel
